properties.Details: Tic Tac Toe - A revolutionary new mobile game made by two noobs who learned a plethora of iOS knowledge in 36 hours.
Rolling Ball Unity Game - Objective is to roll a ball to collect points and win the game!
Worked closely with non-profits, development organizations, and tech companies to address social issues.
Technical Lab teaching assistant helping undergraduate students.

Accepted in Velocity Residence Program, worked in a startup in Communitech's Velocity Garage with access to mentors, funding, and startup resources. Met my velocity family. Best experience of my life :)
Accepted to YC's Startup School MC'ed by Alexis ohanian with speakers  Shana Fisher, Fred Wilson, Zach Sims, Kathryn Minshew, Apoorva, Sam Altman, and Garry Tan.
Part of original organizing team for Canada's biggest hackathon - Hack the North originating from Velocity Incubator.
Kairos Society is a global nonprofit organization that connects student entrepreneurs in the spaces of clean technology, healthcare, and education.

Represented the University of Waterloo's Hyperloop Team in the SpaceX competition. Gave technical presentation and demo's to undergraduate STEM students from all over the world at MaRS Discovery District.
Integrated a Microscoft Word add-on that allows audio parsing of the data. with Bing's speech text to speech API.

Four-day annual international convention held in Toronto, Canada for the minerals and mining industry attracting exhibitors, investors, analysts, mining executives, geologists and government officials. Attended technical sessions, short courses, and networking events.
Top 10 Hack at Google - CallAunty is an app which allows expectant mothers to call-in to determine if they are high risk and receive care.
Motion controlled hardware attachment to control common household devices like light bulbs, sound system, and more. One of my favorite hardware hacks.

Network with graduate students, postdocs and faculty members in theoretical physics specifically in  cutting-edge research on condensed matter, cosmology, quantum fields/gravity/strings, and mathematical physics.

Invited by Kairos Society as an entrepreneur to help solve challenges where goverments and private industries have failed to innovate. Specifcally worked with The Salvation Army brainstorming ideas. Partnership with OCAD University.
Got waitlisted for tickets and lined up three hours in advance to get a front seat to see Steve Wozniak, co-founder of Apple Inc at University of San Francisco. 10/10 would do again :)
Invited by Mercedes-Benz's Innovation Lab to be one of the first to start building with the 80+ mock APIs, SDKs and car emulators in an 8-week challenge.

Represented University of Waterloo's Canadian Team - Waterloop at the Hyperloop pod design competition at Texas A&M University. Comeptition where teams participating design and build a subscale prototype transport vehicle to demonstrate te technical feasibility of various aspects of Elon Musk's Hyperloop concept. Tesla and SpaceX engineers as judges.
Completed an e-learning course that provides visual introduction to financial markets and the core functionality of the Bloomberg terminal.
